website_summaries.verdict: This dispenser comes with a unique stand to keep your batter upright and off the counter.
pros: 4-cup capacity dispenser made from dishwasher safe stainless steel
Stand keeps batter from spilling onto counter
For use with batter, sauce, frosting and tomato sauce
cons: Several customers reported the unit arrived without its stand

customer_reviews.title: No Stand Included
customer_reviews.text: I sent the unit back. The picture of the item shows a stand to hold the dispenser. It was not included and is a useless item without the stand. I think other people have had the same issue. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: make sure they send all in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with its stand. cant use it without a stand, unless I want a big mess
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hepner

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to deposit gummies and other candies into starch or silicon molds!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my food lab to deposit chocolates, caramels, gummies and gummy vitamins. It works like a charm and is easy to clean. The stand is an extra bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Safety in loading
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel unit with stand allowed me to pour hot liquid, held more. Was easier to control flow, durability is far greater than anything I have used to make candles.
customer_reviews.author: ORBY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Plain to send back. Damage to handle and stand didn't come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Use for more than pancakes
customer_reviews.text: I use this more often than I probably should. It's meant for pancake batter and works amazingly for it, but I use it for gravies and sauces at dinner pretty regularly. It never drips, so I've found it to be a cleaner option than a gravy boat.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Very well built but a very small hole
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to expedite things when we make pancakes for our community breakfasts. Though it's very well built and can go straight into the dishwasher/sanitizer, the hole that the batter passes through is so small that it takes 5-15 seconds, depending upon how full the hopper is, to dispense each pancake. When your need 12 pancakes at a time on the griddle, this is the last piece of equipment you'd want. If you're looking to make a few perfect pancakes at home, this thing is what you're looking for. There are also many other potential applications for this 100% leakproof dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel-Rah

customer_reviews.title: Candles/cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: If you make candles (especially tealights,) salves or anything else like that this is invaluable. No drips, not too tiring to hold, doesn't clog if you don't let the wax harden too much and holds a nice amount of liquid. Con: Cleaning: the stopper mechanism doesn't detach which makes it difficult, but not impossible, to wipe the inside. When I was wiping it once, the stopper detached and it took some time to get it back on so the pressure on it was enough to seal the opening completely. One star removed for this, but I'd still recommend this no problem.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Simple works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this pancake dispenser. The pancakes came out a little to slow but my husband drilled the hole a little bigger and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Good to have.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for caramels. Works great, makes filling molds so easy, no mess. Cleaning the spring and the bottom plug are a little difficult to clean, but I always soak and clean as soon as finished using. Tip- fill with hot water and warm up before filling with, in my case, caramel, so that it flow easily and cools slower, filling molds quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L

customer_reviews.title: good tool, but...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to load, easy to clean, but the dispensing hole is not big enough for thicker batter, like ones with whole wheat / grains.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff DeMaine

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: What i did not like about it thst it is not real stainless steel
customer_reviews.author: Moh Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Should last me a long time. I used for pancakes and then some waffles. I will recommend this unit to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Little

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this product.
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Arrived broken. It has rust in it, or something similar. I’m returning this item. I’m not likely to order another. This is my second attempt at a similar product. Quality and customer satisfaction is going downhill.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Dobson

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it promised to do. It dispenses pancake batter with plenty of control and not a lot of mess. It's easy to clean. It appears well made for for what it was designed to do. I would recommend it to anyone who makes pancakes for their family.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam C.

customer_reviews.title: Pancakes are a snap now!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice my young sons enjoy helping make pancakes with it. No more dripping batter from a spoon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Sonrise

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser is easy to use, and honestly fun. We all took turns trying to make pancakes in different shapes and sizes. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Toler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. a few scratches kept me from giving it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Chalmette, LA

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great. Does not drip. Looked for this at BB&B and could not find it so this is a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie Chang

customer_reviews.title: Need bigger hole
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but hole in smaller, we had to cut and make it bigger.I used this to make our traditional round bread “selroti” .For manufacturer if they could make hole 2-3 inch wider you guys can sell a lot of these.
customer_reviews.author: Shyamala

customer_reviews.title: Product came without stand
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today, really disappointed that it came without stand even though picture shows with stand. Also, FAQ says stand is included. Planning to return it.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Tough to clean
customer_reviews.text: Tough to clean, but nice that it came with a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. It’s great for the price. My only concern is the thumb mechanism is kinda flimsy. Could bend easily. Otherwise decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the unit very well but wish it fed the mix out a bit faster
customer_reviews.author: Richard larson

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Clean!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, easy, clean!!! Best purchase so far!! Cut my time in half for filling my bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Alexo

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Kind of tiring to press the release and the rubber stopper broke off into my battery. It was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Saekit

customer_reviews.title: Trigger Spring Rusts
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product was good. This one DID come with the stand. Use quite often. Much cleaner than trying to pour from mixing bowl. What I didn’t like is the spring on the thumb trigger that dispenses the pancake mix has rusted. I’m going to head to the local hardware store to see if a spring is made of stainless steel that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Domino Prasky

customer_reviews.title: Tip of nozzle broke and the spring is rusted
customer_reviews.text: After using it only 3 times, the tip of the nozzle split and is breaking off. The product was described as "stainless steel", but the spring has rusted.
customer_reviews.author: I need my coffee

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with my bakery business. I liked the looks of it and the price was right. It is worth every penny and then some. I pop it in the dishwasher and that’s it. It’s lightweight so my arm doesn’t get tired holding it, and the trigger works great! If you want one that controls the drip...this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Randy-Dewey, Ok

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can count 1-3 seconds and get nearly perfect SAME sized pancakes with little to no drippings
customer_reviews.author: tewilkie

customer_reviews.title: Pops out pancakes pretty quick and so far no drips.
customer_reviews.text: Pancakes on a 36in Blackstone griddle was the main reason for purchasing and this thing works great and looks pretty cool too.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for pancakes! No leaks. This is the second device like this. The first was plastic and it broke after a few uses. This unit has pretty sturdy metal and has held up to several camping trips this summer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ching

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to fill bottles of homemade lotion. It works great, but one thing I'd recommend to the maker of the product. The handle is not completely sealed, so when it is submerged into water, it will collect water in the handle then drip out as you use it. Cleaning isn't that great. You will need a very small bottle brush to get it thoroughly cleaned. The stand is really helpful but you'll want to put a bowl or plate under it for minor drippings.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Baer

customer_reviews.title: Great Appliance
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this to use at our church's pancake breakfasts. It has been a hit! Pancake making has never been easier or quicker!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very good quality. I always use it when making pancakes. The kids love it as well I recommend that you soak it in water once done otherwise it's just a little annoying to clean areas around the coiled spring.
customer_reviews.author: HZ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The opening is too small to deliver the batter with any speed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

product_meta.title: MyLifeUNIT Stainless Steel Pancake Batter Dispenser, Funnel Dispenser with Stand for Takoyaki and Baking
product_meta.description:
Size:Type AMyLifeUNIT pancake batter dispenser is suitable for home, restaurant, hotel, snack bar, cake shop, etc. 
It is great for takoyaki balls, pancakes, muffin, crepes, waffles, biscuits and more 
Features: 
- Easily and accurately dispenses most batters, sauces, and frostings, even pizza sauce 
- Made of high-quality stainless steel, environmentally friendly and not easy to rust 
- The detachable handle makes it easy to store and save space 
- Smooth and comfortable handle, not tired for long time use 
- The batter dispenser is an essential baking tool for the kitchen 
- Easy to clean, can be scrubbed with a cloth, dishwasher safe 
Product Specifications: 
- Material: Stainless steel 
- Capacity: 4 Cup/ 1000 ML 
- Color: Silver 
Size: 
- Funnel: Diameter 5.1 inch/130 mm and height 7.9 inch/200 mm 
- Stand: Diameter 5.2 inch/133 mm and 4.7 inch/120 mm, height 5.5 inch/140 mm 
- Handle length 5.0 inch/128 mm 
- The mouth size is 0.3 inch/8 mm 
Package Including: 
1 Funnel and 1 Stand
feature_bullets: Funnels with Rack: The batter dispenser is an essential baking tool for the kitchen. It is suitable for takoyaki balls, pancakes, crepes, muffin, cupcakes, waffles, chocolate balls, etc. Scientific pancake maker is very good at controlling the flow of liquids without wasting. It can easily and accurately dispense most batter, seasonings and icing, even pizza sauce.

High-quality Material: The cake batter dispenser is made of high-quality stainless steel. The stainless steel material is safe, environmentally friendly and not easy to rust, with the features of resistant to falling and durable. It can be used for a long time without damage. The pancake dispenser is easy to clean and the dishwasher is safe.

Easy to Operation: Our detachable octopus balls maker is easy to install and does not require any installation tools. You only need to align the concave arc of the handle with the interface and push it up to install it. The handle that is installed will not fall off and it will help you to make delicious food very well.

Detachable Handle Saves Space: The detachable handle design, you can remove the handle when you are not using it for easy storage and space saving. In addition, you can install the handle to make takoyaki balls, cupcakes, pancakes, etc. The pancake batter dispenser is suitable for home, restaurant, hotel, snack bar, cake shop, etc.

Dimensions and Capacity: Size of the funnel: diameter 5.1 inch/130 mm, height 7.9 inch/200 mm and the mouth size is 0.3 inch/8 mm; Size of the stand: diameter 5.2 inch/133 mm and 4.7 inch/120 mm, height 5.5 inch/140 mm; the handle length 5.0 inch/128 mm. Capacity: 4 Cup/ 1000 ML.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars65 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
